system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}

Benefit

When firing an assault, battle, carbine, or target rifle, or sub-machine gun the Combat Point cost is reduced by 1 and the character gains a +1 attack bonus to all attacks.
